creator: AppsVillage Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Already have a Facebook page for your store, restaurant or pub, and want to be able to do more to bring your loyal customers back?
Came across an app of a competitor and want one too, but its too expensive or complicated?

AppsVillage helps you to build and manage your own amazing app, customized to your business needs, and available for everyone!
YES! Your own customized app can be downloaded by everyone.
Using the new and innovative Progressive Web App (PWA) technology, AppsVillage delivers amazing apps that can be launched instantly.
You don’t have to be techie or invest hours and hours on app builder websites, building and customizing the menus and screens of your app - AppsVillage gives you an already tailored app with all the features you need!
With this AppsVillage admin app you can create, manage and monitor your app, available to you wherever you are, around the clock.
Through the AppsVillage admin app you can:
+ Notify your customers about new offers and updates
+ Post sales of special deals, to be purchased from your app, supporting all credit cards!
+ Give away coupons of discounts to be redeemed at your business
+ Offer punch cards (e.g. get a free cup of coffee after buying 10 cups)
+ Allow customers to book appointments right from the app
+ Add different types of external links viewed throught the internal browser allowing you to use any existing service you may already have (like table reservations, online store, ordering service, menu, etc.)
+ Stay in touch with your customer with a one on one chat
+ Track and analyze users impressions, activity and sales revenues
And much more…
descriptionShort: Your business app is only a click away
